cwipp.LESplume¶

class cwipp.LESplume(name)¶

Child Plume class used for simulated plumes (non-predictive mode).

Assumes full model fields are available.

profile¶

1D vector corresponding to quasi-stationary downwind PM profile [concentration]

Type:ndarray
quartiles¶

2D array with columns corresponding to Q1 and Q3 profiles [concentration]

Type:ndarray
zCL¶

plume injection height [m]

Type:float
centerline¶

masked array containing height indices of plume centerline

Type:ndarray
ctr_idx¶

list of vertical indecies correponding to centerline height

Type:list
THzCL¶

ambient potential temperature at zCL [K]

Type:float
__init__(name)¶

Constructs the plume object with some inital attributes …

Parameters:name (str) – plume name

Methods

__init__(name) Constructs the plume object with some inital attributes
classify() Classifies the plume as penetrative (True) or boundary layer (False)
get_I(flux2D, length, *Us) Finds cross-wind fireline intensity parameter I
get_wf() Finds characteristic time (Tau) and velocity (wf) scales.
get_zCL(pm, **kwargs) Extracts mean injection height from LES.
